Posts.EditableText: HELP!!! i am stuck! the only areas i cant get into are the keypad room in the attic,  the master bedroom,  and the pool room.  i have the key head but i cannot find the handle and i cannot figure out how to use the keypad in the attic any hints??
Posts.HTML: HELP!!! i am stuck! the only areas i cant get into are the keypad room in the attic,  the master bedroom,  and the pool room.  i have the key head but i cannot find the handle and i cannot figure out how to use the keypad in the attic any hints??

Posts.EditableText:
For the keypad password, you have to go to the art gallery first.  
Get the dining room painting and if you look around afterwards, you'll find the password...
Posts.HTML:
For the keypad password, you have to go to the art gallery first.

Posts.EditableText: right in front of me the whole time! thanks!
